author: Bradley Hope
title: When Volatility Strikes, Which Stocks Stand to Gain?
text:
Exchanges and market makers are getting a fresh look from portfolio managers seeking out investments likely to benefit from the large swings in stock, bond and currency markets.
Among those deemed likeliest to profit from the marketâ€™s rising volatility, many investors say, are futures and options exchanges such as CBOE Holdings Inc. and CME Group Inc., and trading firms including Virtu Financial Inc. and KCG Holdings Inc.
